name: Ambulance in a hurry
description:
Ambulance in a hurry is a simple arcade game where you are driving ambulance car through traffic jam. Try to survive for as long as you can without any traffic collision and save those sick or injured people. Game will get harder to play cause game speed will increase every second.

How to play:
To control ambulance vehicle just touch on the screen. Vehicle will follow your finger.

Features:
• simple to play
• awesome craft looking graphics
• very addictive
• share your score with your friends via social media pages
• retro background music

Developing quality apps and games like Ambulance in a hurry requires months of effort and dedication. To keep the development going and to recover our cost, this game uses ads for monetization. However, this game will not install any ad-related search bars on your phone or place ads in your notification bar.

Because your opinion means a lot to us, please give that game a rate and a review. We really appreciate it!
